content: a free version of this pattern can be found on my blog here 1 a classic unisex set for any age this cuffed hat and snug fit cowl are the perfect cozy gift or personal project knit with a squishy rib pattern the stitches are simple and meditative making the project portable and easy to work on any time of day shop the full kit here 2 **sizes** sizes newborn baby toddler child adult adult xl **finished dimensions** cowl circumference 13 25 14 75 16 17 25 18 75 20 length 4 5 6 5 8 5 11 12 /10 12 5 16 5 22 28 30 5 cm hat circumference 10 12 13 25 14 75 16 75 18 /25 5 30 5 34 37 5 42 5 45 5 cm stretches to fit length un-cuffed 9 9 75 10 5 11 5 12 5 13 5 /23 24 5 26 5 29 32 34 5 cm **difficulty level** beginner **skills** knitting and purling k2tog and p2tog decreases working in the round all patterns are written in standard us terms sign up for info on special offers sales and new pattern releases bit ly/townewsletter **connect** instagram @twoofwands facebook facebook com/twoofwands pinterest pinterest com/twoofwandsknits youtube youtube com/twoofwandsknits **help** join the crew of wands facebook group 3 to connect with other makers of two of wands patterns for help with techniques and pattern related questions **selling finished items** small batch sales of finished pieces made from this pattern are permitted but seller must use their own photographs and credit must be given to two of wands as the designer the pattern and photographs of this design are the property of two of wands and are for personal non-commercial use only these files are protected by us copyright and you may not distribute or sell them electronically or physically 1 https //www twoofwands com/blog/trailway-hat-and-cowl-set 2 https //lionbrand sjv io/gkpynr 3 https //www facebook com/groups/2228982030505289
